description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes, layout, and responsive design for the App component in a Tic Tac Toe frontend application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styles for layout and theme management.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styles for the App with background and layout properties.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the logo of the App with animation for visual effect.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the App, including hover effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styles for toggling between themes with hover and active states.
